name: No F's in the Chat
description:
CONTROLS

Mouse - click on a chat box, then click on one of the buttons that appear to take that action against it like banning the user.

PREMISE

You're a moderator for Cold Truth with Alice Janet on popular streaming site Tremors. Your task is to keep the chat from getting  Out Of Control (GMTK 2020's theme) by taking actions against the more unruly chatters.

Keeping the chat clean attracts more viewers, but unnecessary actions will hurt viewership!

CREDITS
